title: Opal-Eye, Konda's Yojimbo
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.): The next time a source of your choice would deal damage this turn, that damage is dealt to Opal-Eye, Konda's Yojimbo instead.: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Opal-Eye this turn.
